sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 25th and 26th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 23, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – These trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Plenty of lake effect , combined with low 20 degree temps, plus the full big groom this morning , makes Nubs Knob red and blue trails as nice as it gets !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Excellent day out classic skiing on skins.  Tracks very good and fast most of the way around in the woods except for a few shallow spots but not down to the dirt.  Tracks blown in on connector with the wind.  Snow gun was running today also.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be power-tilled this morning. Conditions will be soft with all the new snow.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Seven more inches of high quality lake effect snow landed at Nub's Nob last night. This is very light and perfect skiing snow. Some of this fresh snow is laying on top of the steep groomed runs. We are doing a second groom this morning on the majority of the green circle runs along with our race hill, Birch Run. This continues to be an amazing winter for skiers and riders, we now have 90" of snow for the season and it's not even February. The snowshoe trails and XC trails are also in very good condition. We are proud to host our friends at the 70+ ski club today for their NASTAR race. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 9 PM today with an hour break at 4:30 PM to prepare for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
